A short catechism about Baptism. By John Tombes, B.D. Tombes, John, 1603?-1676.
[22] p.
Printed by Henry Hills, next door to the sign of the Peacock in Aldersgate-street, London : 1659.
Signatures: A B⁴ (-A1). Annotation on Thomason copy: "may"; "May. 14". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
